aanduwa helikoptar 14 k genwimata salasum kara athi bawata eeye (19 wanida) madhyata karunu anawaranaya karamin me bawa sandahan kala niroshan perera mahatha yuddhaya awasan wi thibena mewani mohothaka helikoptar 14 k genwimata kisidu awashyathawak nomathi bawa pawasiya.
